akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 93–383, title II, § 204, Aug. 22, 1974, 88 Stat. 668

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1455a. Repealed. Pub. L. 93–383, title II, § 204, Aug. 22, 1974, 88 Stat. 668
Section, act Aug. 2, 1954, ch. 649, title VIII, § 815, 68 Stat. 647, required submission of specifications by applicants prior to award of any contract for construction of a project and submission of data with respect to acquisition of land prior to authorization to purchase such land.
